name: Mutant Shot
description:
The mutant apocalypse is upon us! An experiment has gone terribly wrong and people are mutating into...well, you know, mutants! Your mission is to take out these menacing creatures before they gobble up all of humanity. Will you rise and become the ultimate mutant shot?

- "Endless shooter" in which you must quickly shoot all the mutants and avoid shooting humans.
- Action packed, fast paced, highly-addictive arcade style shooting will have you completely hooked.
- Bright, colorful, cartoony visuals with dozens of unique characters.
- Progressively gets faster and more difficult.
- Game Center Leaderboards: Try to get the highest score/combo!
- Upgrade to shotgun or bazooka and show those dastardly mutants who's really boss!
- Stay reloaded or you're in trouble!
